original_title: Dracula: The Vampire and the Voivode
overview: This exhaustive documentary attempts to tell the history of Bram Stoker's influential novel Dracula, explaining both the historical antecedents to the story, as well as offering look at Stoker's life in order to help illuminate this enduring horror tale, and exposing some of the myths surrounding vampires that have long been accepted as fact.
tagline: The first documentary ever to reveal the true story of Bram Stoker and his legendary novel...
title: Dracula: The Vampire and the Voivode
